Content: *p75068a02436*do not write in this area 		do not write in this area				 		do not write in this area2417	 this question is about four isomers with the molecular formula c4h8o2.nameskeletal formulabutanoic acidooh4‑hydroxybutanalohohethyl ethanoateoo3‑hydroxybutanoneooh	*(a)	 these four isomers can be identified using three chemical tests. each test gives a positive result for only one isomer. all three tests give a negative result for the fourth isomer.		 deduce the three chemical tests required. for each test•	identify the reagent•	give the positive observation in each test•	identify the functional group of the isomer that gives the positive result.(6)
